storyTitle: As Scheduler, I want to submit schedule change requests to achieve accurate and timely schedule updates

testCases.title: Validate successful schedule change submission with valid data
preconditions: User is authenticated as a Scheduler
User has access to the schedule change submission page
System is operational and responsive
Test document file is prepared (size less than 10MB)

steps.action: Navigate to schedule change submission page
steps.expectedResult: Submission form is displayed with all mandatory fields including date, time, reason, and attachment option clearly visible and accessible

steps.action: Enter valid date in the date field (e.g., future date in correct format)
steps.expectedResult: Date field accepts the input without validation errors

steps.action: Enter valid time in the time field (e.g., HH:MM format)
steps.expectedResult: Time field accepts the input without validation errors

steps.action: Enter a valid reason for the schedule change in the reason field (e.g., 'Resource unavailability')
steps.expectedResult: Reason field accepts the input without validation errors

steps.action: Click on the attachment button and select a valid document file (size less than 10MB)
steps.expectedResult: Document is successfully attached and file name is displayed in the form

steps.action: Click the Submit button
steps.expectedResult: Request is accepted and processed within 2 seconds

steps.action: Verify the status of the submitted request
steps.expectedResult: Request status is set to 'Pending Approval'

steps.action: Check for confirmation message on the screen
steps.expectedResult: Success confirmation message is displayed indicating the schedule change request has been submitted successfully

postconditions: Schedule change request is saved in ScheduleChangeRequests table
Request status is 'Pending Approval'
Request is available for approval workflow
Scheduler can view the submitted request in their request list

testCases.title: Reject submission with missing mandatory fields
preconditions: User is authenticated as a Scheduler
User has access to the schedule change submission page
System is operational and responsive

steps.action: Navigate to schedule change submission page
steps.expectedResult: Submission form is displayed with all mandatory fields clearly marked

steps.action: Enter valid data in the date field only, leaving time and reason fields empty
steps.expectedResult: Date field accepts the input

steps.action: Tab out or click outside the empty mandatory fields
steps.expectedResult: Real-time validation highlights the empty time and reason fields with visual indicators (e.g., red border or asterisk)

steps.action: Click the Submit button without filling all mandatory fields
steps.expectedResult: Submission is blocked and prevented from processing

steps.action: Verify error messages displayed on the screen
steps.expectedResult: Clear error messages are displayed for each missing mandatory field (e.g., 'Time is required', 'Reason is required')

steps.action: Verify the form remains on the submission page
steps.expectedResult: User remains on the submission page with all previously entered data retained

postconditions: No schedule change request is created in the system
Form data is retained for user to complete
User can correct errors and resubmit

testCases.title: Reject attachment exceeding size limit
preconditions: User is authenticated as a Scheduler
User has access to the schedule change submission page
Test file larger than 10MB is prepared (e.g., 11MB file)
System is operational and responsive

steps.action: Navigate to schedule change submission page
steps.expectedResult: Submission form is displayed with attachment option available

steps.action: Enter valid data in all mandatory fields (date, time, reason)
steps.expectedResult: All mandatory fields accept the input without validation errors

steps.action: Click on the attachment button and select a file larger than 10MB (e.g., 11MB file)
steps.expectedResult: Attachment is rejected immediately with a clear error message indicating 'File size exceeds the maximum limit of 10MB'

steps.action: Verify that the oversized file is not attached to the form
steps.expectedResult: No file name is displayed in the attachment area and the attachment field remains empty

steps.action: Click the Submit button without a valid attachment
steps.expectedResult: Submission is blocked with an error message indicating attachment size requirement is not met

steps.action: Remove the oversized file and attach a valid file (size less than 10MB)
steps.expectedResult: Valid file is successfully attached and file name is displayed

steps.action: Click the Submit button with valid attachment
steps.expectedResult: Request is accepted and submitted successfully

postconditions: Only requests with attachments within size limit are accepted
System enforces 10MB attachment size limit consistently
User is informed of size restrictions clearly

storyTitle: As Scheduler, I want to edit or withdraw pending schedule change requests to achieve flexibility and error correction

testCases.title: Edit a pending schedule change request successfully
preconditions: User is authenticated as a Scheduler
At least one schedule change request with status 'Pending Approval' exists in the system
The pending request was submitted by the currently logged-in scheduler
System is operational and responsive
Approvers are configured to receive notifications

steps.action: Navigate to the list of schedule change requests
steps.expectedResult: List of schedule change requests is displayed showing all requests submitted by the scheduler

steps.action: Identify and select a request with 'Pending Approval' status
steps.expectedResult: Request details are displayed in edit mode with all fields (date, time, reason, attachments) accessible for modification

steps.action: Modify the date field to a new valid date
steps.expectedResult: Date field accepts the new value without validation errors

steps.action: Modify the reason field with updated text (e.g., 'Updated: Resource conflict resolved')
steps.expectedResult: Reason field accepts the updated text without validation errors

steps.action: Remove existing attachment and upload a new document (size less than 10MB)
steps.expectedResult: Old attachment is removed and new attachment is successfully uploaded and displayed

steps.action: Click the Submit or Update button to save changes
steps.expectedResult: Changes are accepted and processed within 2 seconds

steps.action: Verify confirmation message is displayed
steps.expectedResult: Success message is displayed confirming the request has been updated

steps.action: Wait for 1 minute and verify approver notification
steps.expectedResult: Approvers are notified of the changes within 1 minute via configured notification method

steps.action: View the updated request details
steps.expectedResult: Request displays the modified date, reason, and new attachment with status still 'Pending Approval'

postconditions: Schedule change request is updated in ScheduleChangeRequests table
Request status remains 'Pending Approval'
Approvers have been notified of the modifications
Updated request is available in the pending requests list

testCases.title: Withdraw a pending schedule change request
preconditions: User is authenticated as a Scheduler
At least one schedule change request with status 'Pending Approval' exists in the system
The pending request was submitted by the currently logged-in scheduler
System is operational and responsive
Approvers are configured to receive notifications

steps.action: Navigate to the list of schedule change requests
steps.expectedResult: List of schedule change requests is displayed showing all requests submitted by the scheduler

steps.action: Identify and select a request with 'Pending Approval' status
steps.expectedResult: Request details are displayed with withdraw option available

steps.action: Click the Withdraw button
steps.expectedResult: Confirmation dialog is displayed asking 'Are you sure you want to withdraw this request?'

steps.action: Click Confirm or Yes to proceed with withdrawal
steps.expectedResult: Withdrawal is processed within 2 seconds

steps.action: Verify the request status is updated
steps.expectedResult: Request status is changed to 'Withdrawn' and displayed in the request list

steps.action: Verify confirmation message is displayed
steps.expectedResult: Success message is displayed confirming the request has been withdrawn

steps.action: Wait for 1 minute and verify approver notification
steps.expectedResult: Approvers are notified of the withdrawal within 1 minute via configured notification method

steps.action: Verify the withdrawn request is no longer in the pending list
steps.expectedResult: Request is removed from pending requests list or clearly marked as 'Withdrawn'

postconditions: Schedule change request status is updated to 'Withdrawn' in ScheduleChangeRequests table
Request is no longer in the approval workflow
Approvers have been notified of the withdrawal
Request cannot be edited or resubmitted without creating a new request

testCases.title: Prevent editing or withdrawing approved requests
preconditions: User is authenticated as a Scheduler
At least one schedule change request with status 'Approved' exists in the system
The approved request was submitted by the currently logged-in scheduler
System is operational and responsive

steps.action: Navigate to the list of schedule change requests
steps.expectedResult: List of schedule change requests is displayed showing all requests including approved ones

steps.action: Identify and select a request with 'Approved' status
steps.expectedResult: Request details are displayed in read-only mode

steps.action: Attempt to click the Edit button or modify any field
steps.expectedResult: Edit option is disabled (grayed out) or an error message is displayed stating 'Cannot edit approved requests'

steps.action: Verify all input fields are non-editable
steps.expectedResult: All fields (date, time, reason, attachments) are displayed as read-only and cannot be modified

steps.action: Attempt to click the Withdraw button
steps.expectedResult: Withdrawal option is disabled (grayed out) or an error message is displayed stating 'Cannot withdraw approved requests'

steps.action: Verify no confirmation dialog appears for withdrawal
steps.expectedResult: No withdrawal confirmation dialog is displayed and no action is taken

steps.action: Navigate back to the request list
steps.expectedResult: Request status remains 'Approved' and no changes have been made

postconditions: Approved request remains unchanged in the system
Request status remains 'Approved'
No notifications are sent to approvers
System integrity is maintained by preventing modification of approved requests
